Ducks are omnivores, meaning they eat both plants and animals. They eat a variety of foods including aquatic plants, insects, fish, worms, mollusks, crustaceans, and other small animals. They also eat grains, fruits, and seeds.
Ducks typically eat a variety of aquatic plants, insects, fish, worms, mollusks, crustaceans, and other small aquatic animals. They also eat grains, seeds, and berries.
